title: PPA Price Negotiation Support
description: An energy trader needs to analyze market data to propose a competitive price for a 10-year Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) with a corporate off-taker.

tasks.description: Fetch the last 24 months of historical wholesale electricity prices for the relevant market node.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves accurate historical price data.

tasks.description: Analyze long-term price forecasts and market volatility trends.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent summarizes key trends and forecasted price ranges.

tasks.description: Calculate a proposed PPA price with a target profit margin, considering price cannibalization and curtailment risks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a justified PPA price and risk assessment.
